data.title: A bit faded but cozy!
data.body:
I recently purchased the MIULEE Corduroy Pillow Covers, and they've been a delightful addition to my home decor. The set of 2 super soft boho striped pillow covers not only adds an appealing texture to my living room but also offers a cozy and inviting vibe.

Measuring 18 x 18 inches, they fit my throw pillows perfectly and instantly elevated the look of my couch. The sage green color, though beautiful, does have one downside: it appears a bit faded. However, this muted coloration can work to your advantage if you prefer a more understated, rustic aesthetic.
